Hash: Yes temporary indexes for equality joins
Expression: Yes for some scalar functions like LOWER and UPPER

R-/R+ tree: Aria and MyISAM tables and, since v10.2.2, InnoDB tables only
Spatial: Aria and MyISAM tables and, since v10.2.2, InnoDB tables only

Bitmap: Bitmap filter index for Star Join Query

Full-text: MyISAM tables and, since v5.6.4, InnoDB tables
Spatial: MyISAM tables and, since v5.7.5, InnoDB tables
